subject: Automobile Racing
Indianapolis 500 (Auto Race)
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: The Indianapolis 500 and IndyCar Series champion last year, Dario Franchitti is part of an influx of drivers from open-wheel racing into Nascar’s Sprint Cup this year.
snippet: The Indianapolis 500 and IndyCar Series champion last year, Dario Franchitti is part of an influx of drivers from open-wheel racing into Nascar’s Sprint Cup this year.
